message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SE 

This paper discusses a security and privacy issue in smart home platforms, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a solution that involves user interaction and interface design, which relates to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also involves data analysis and machine learning techniques to derive a relative ranking of risks associated with device operations, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR) and possibly social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper proposes a system that involves software engineering and system design, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
